comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Perhaps you could translate the numbers you mentioned above into more specific figures. For example, what does this average of 1.9 million visitors mean for your potential client?What is the conversion rate? Can you present the statistics of one case, so that we can be convinced of the effectiveness of this kind of promotion?Since this is an unconventional way of advertising and not so well known, can you show a live example?It is also desirable to know the approximate price range for this service.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: If only you could just edit and include your website, that would be nice so we could be able to see for ourselves what you really are talking about.You just got registered with few activities and you are bumping the thread when you have no much engagement here. I will advise you to be constantly engaging in Â the community threads and boards. You will definitely get the attention you desire. It is a gradual process which I believe you will understand how it works. With time, you will achieve getting your publication as long as you have a clean, clear intention here.
